name: sunday ballet slippers
notes:
this slippers pattern starts at the toe working in rounds, then in rows until desired length is reached, then around the top to cinch things up! 

**pattern notes:**

place first stitch of each row in the same stitch as your chain.

ch-2 at beginning of round does not count as a stitch.

pattern written in us terms.

instead of using the magic circle you could also chain-4, join to first chain to form a circle.
